text: Bubble Guppies is an American animated musical television series for kids. It was produced by Nickelodeon and created by Jonny Belt and Robert Scull. It is a combination of the sketch comedy, edutainment and musical genres. The show is about merperson preschool children: Molly, Gil, Goby, Deema, Oona, Nonny, and Zooli. The show was released on Nickelodeon on January 24, 2011. It originally ran for 4 seasons until its conclusion on October 17, 2016. The show was made using 3D software. The show originally aired for 4 seasons over almost 3 years. After the last episode of its original run, it was revived for a 5th season on June 4, 2019. The 5th season aired on September 23, 2019. On February 19, 2020, the show was renewed for a 6th season. It was 1st aired on October 19, 2021. Bubble Guppies was ended on June 30, 2023. ==Main Characters== * Molly - a mermaid and lead singer of the Bubble Guppies. * Gil - a merman and other lead singer of the Bubble Guppies. * Nonny - a quiet merman guppy. * Oona - a very cute mermaid guppy. * Deema - a very silly mermaid guppy. * Goby - a creative merman guppy who's Gil's best friend. * Zooli - a mermaid girl in Seasons 5 and 6. * Mr. Grouper - a fish who is yellow-orange striped. He's the Guppies' teacher. * Bubble Puppy - a white and orange dog. He's Gil's very own pet. * Little Fish - 2 or 3 little fishes. * Clam - a gray grumpy clam with 2 small black eyes. (Season 1 only) ==Reccuring characters== * Mr. Grumpfish - a big fish. He is very grouchy. * Snails, Lobsters and Crabs * Pretzelquatel (season 1) ==References== Category:Nickelodeon television series Category:2010s American animated television series Category:2010s American children's television series Category:2020s American animated television series Category:2020s American children's television series Category:American fantasy television series Category:American television series revived after cancellation Category:Canadian children's television series Category:2011 American television series debuts Category:2016 American television series endings Category:2019 American television series debuts Category:English-language television programs Category:Television series about friendship Category:2023 Canadian television series endings Category:2023 television series endings
